subject: Olympic Games
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: A month after giving birth, Kristin Armstrong, the Olympic gold medalist and two-time world champion, is mounting a return in the hopes of making the 2012 Olympics.
snippet: A month after giving birth, Kristin Armstrong, the Olympic gold medalist and two-time world champion, is mounting a return in the hopes of making the 2012 Olympics.
